notes.disclaimer: The content of this repo-file is generated automatically from data provided by third-party sources. It is not guaranteed to be accurate or up-to-date. Please report any instances of unappriopriate content or malicious files, the causing repositories will be removed from the list.
notes.icons-invalid: Currently, relative paths are not supported for icons. This results in the ext.icon field of mods being mostly useless. This will be fixed in a future update.
notes.depends: The depends filed may contain invalid values, as it's generation is not yet finished. This will be fixed in a future update.
